title: Need Players to Play with... Friendly Players who won't judge
body:
I have been playing with my friends, well i thought they were. Not treating me right, so need some new friends to play league with.... 

Thanks

replies.body:
trying to have fun in league in season 6

big memef!!
i names make us meant to be together
Add me, I am pretty nice and happy to make new friends :) Dopechikk

I could be your friend if you want me.
Add me if you want to.
